profile.title: Web Developer
profile.description: I primarily work in web development with Next.js.

main-content.title: About
main-content.about: I started my programming journey in 2023 by building web applications. That same year, I developed a functional SaaS using Next.js as my first major project. Since then, I have been creating commercial landing pages and honing my Python and React skills through the personal projects listed here.

01.title: Criminal Sentence Execution System
01.description: Assist lawyers in their criminal sentence execution calculations, allowing them to manage their clients.
